data.text: @Nouryia72 @CityNewsKIT You would think as public health they would come out of their basements and review the reports before promoting the shot , itâ€™s rather irresponsible of them
@CityNewsKIT People were told to wait 12 weeks after infection. Around 30% were infected Since Mid December. Many are not at 12 weeks yet. The article doesn't mention that at all.
@redstar01010 @CityNewsKIT We all need to remember opinions are just that opinion they are neither right nor wrong.

@redstar01010 @CityNewsKIT If the vaccine was a better protector, like the MMR and polio if everyone is vaccinated it's eradicated - I could understand mandates. I honestly don't give a shit one way or the other I have a kid and a life to struggle with.  This is only my opinion mind you.
@CityNewsKIT Maybe people are in my shoes.... got covid before I could get my booster, so now I am waiting 3 months before I could get a booster
@CityNewsKIT Stop pushing this garbage!  It doesn't work.  Those who want it got it (or were forced to get it to put food on the table), those who don't won't,  ever

@Thesylverdragon @CityNewsKIT I'm totally cool with one's ability to make decisions based on personal choice and circumstances. 

I'm 100% against any time of vaccine mandate for the current crop of cvd vaccines until 5 year of safety data.
